SEARCH
Package Applicant

Class ApplicantController

java.lang.Object
Applicant.ApplicantController
public class ApplicantController extends Object
Controller class for managing operations related to Applicant entities. Handles creation and updates of applicant profiles using data from the repository.

    • ApplicantController

      public ApplicantController()

  • Method Details

    • createApplicant

      public static Applicant createApplicant(User user)
      Creates an Applicant object using the given User object. Links the User profile to the applicant and returns the updated Applicant.
      Parameters:
      user - the User object containing login credentials
      Returns:
      the Applicant object with linked user profile, or null if not found

    • updateAge

      public static boolean updateAge(Applicant applicant, int age)
      Updates the age of the given applicant and persists the change in the repository.
      Parameters:
      applicant - the applicant to update
      age - the new age to set
      Returns:
      true if the update was successful, false otherwise

    • updateName

      public static boolean updateName(Applicant applicant, String name)
      Updates the name of the given applicant and persists the change in the repository.
      Parameters:
      applicant - the applicant to update
      name - the new name to set
      Returns:
      true if the update was successful, false otherwise

    • updateMaritalStatus

      public static boolean updateMaritalStatus(Applicant applicant, String maritalStatus)
      Updates the marital status of the given applicant based on a string input ("M" or "S").
      Parameters:
      applicant - the applicant to update
      maritalStatus - a string representing the new marital status ("M" for Married, "S" for Single)
      Returns:
      true if the update was successful, false otherwise

    • getApplicantById

      public static Applicant getApplicantById(String id)
      Retrieves an Applicant object by its ID from the repository.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique identifier (NRIC) of the applicant
      Returns:
      the corresponding Applicant object, or null if not found
